note: Non-melanoma skin cancers are excluded due to potentially incomplete records and inconsistent registry practices.
title: Share of new cancers caused by helicobacter pylori bacteria
subtitle: Share of new [cancer](#dod:cancer) cases attributed to helicobacter pylori bacteria. Helicobacter pylori (H. pylori) is a type of bacteria that infects the stomach lining and is one of the key risk factors for the development of certain types of cancer, particularly stomach cancer.
